# dbodb_endorsement.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodb_endorsement")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stendorsments_tmp
AS
SELECT 
    c.id
    ,c.delid
	,c.claimtype
	,to_timestamp(c.claimdate) as claimdate
	,c.did
	,c.parcelid
	,c.barcode
	,c.attachid
	,c.note
    ,d.waybillid
    
FROM publicclaim c
LEFT JOIN publicdelivery d on d.id = c.delid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stendorsments
AS
SELECT 
    e.ID as lms_db_endorsement_id
	,e.Description as lms_db_endorsement_description
    ,er.ID as lms_wbendorsement_id
    ,er.Barcode as lms_wbendorsement_barcode
    ,er.WaybillID as lms_wbendorsement_waybillid
    ,et.id as orv_claim_id
    ,et.delid as orv_claim_delid
	,et.claimtype as orv_claim_claimtype
	,et.claimdate as orv_claim_claimdate
	,et.did as orv_claim_did
	,et.parcelid as orv_claim_parcelid
	,et.barcode as orv_claim_barcode
	,et.attachid as orv_claim_attachid
	,et.note as orv_claim_note
    
FROM dbodb_endorsement e
LEFT JOIN dbowbendorsement er on er.EType = e.ID
LEFT JOIN stendorsments_tmp et on et.waybillid||'|'||et.barcode = er.WaybillID||'|'||er.barcode
